hero.title: Hi, I'm Abdelrahman
hero.subtitle: I build fast, accessible web apps.

about.title: About
about.tagline: Front‑end engineer crafting fast, polished web apps.
about.bio: I’m a front‑end developer focused on building production‑ready interfaces with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind. I’ve delivered dashboards, design systems, and e‑commerce experiences for teams at Ejada and freelance clients, emphasizing accessibility, performance, and clean architecture.
highlights: Built notification, loyalty, and admin dashboards with RTL, theming, and i18n.
Designed and documented a reusable component system (shadcn/ui + Storybook).
Shipped Shopify storefronts and custom UI improvements, integrating APIs and payments.
Ship with modern tooling: React Query, TanStack Table, CI/CD, and clear communication.
